description:
Get there and back without losing track of your gear. The RoundTrip Boot pack stores your boots, helmet, goggles and other items together, with external pockets for gloves or accessories. Grab your skis or board, throw the pack on your back, and you're on your way.

  • Large zippered access to main compartment
  • Padded shoulder straps and multiple grab handles for comfortable carry
  • Zippered pockets keep you organized, fleece-lined pocket protects your goggles
  • External lash loops for attaching helmet or accessories
  • Backpanel folds down for use as a standing mat
  • Grommets in boot compartment let melted snow escape
name: Thule RoundTrip Boot Backpack 45L - Unisex
